FX Currency Option transaction 

 
This is a sample letter created for the purpose of testing the regression tool for PDF 
comparisons and change detection and reporting.  
The document will have random paragraphs with text and number that act as a placeholder 
text for performing various testing on the functionality of the diff Report module. The 
document will also have content laid out is a structure resembling any random given contract 
to have a better picture of how the tool performs with text aligned in various structures and 
alignments. There could be minor changes across multiple documents that the tool is 
expected to report in the final output. 
 
This confirmation is a part of the master agreement dated as of 25 August 2016, as amended 
and supplemented from time to time between ABC bank and XYZ Bank Ltd. 
 
Option A
